name: NotesApp
description: NotesApp is a simple personal project that allows users to create, edit and delete notes. Data is stored in the browser's local storage and the application was deployed using Heroku.

name: MoveIt
description: Project to help students and developers to stay healthy. After each pomodoro cycle (set to 3s just for demonstration purposes) the user gets a light exercise to do, if the user completes it they get xp.

name: Portfolio
description: A responsive portfolio to show my personal projects built with ReactJS and deployed with Vercel. Website animations were made using GSAP.

name: GitHub Clone
description: A simple UI clone developed to gain more experience with TypeScript and styled-components.
